turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I would like to order a coffee drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what Starbucks do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order from the Starbucks in downtown Oakland.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, and what do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what size do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, what type of milk do you want in your latte?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like regular 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, 2% milk. Would you like to add anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like to add a vanilla flavor shot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, and do you want your drink to be hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like it to be hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, is there anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, so I have an order for a grande Latte with 2% milk and vanilla, served hot.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, I will place your order at the Starbucks in downtown Oakland.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order for a grande latte with 2% milk and vanilla, served hot, from the downtown Oakland Starbucks has been placed. Your order will be ready for pick up shortly and the receipt will be sent via text to your mobile device.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!
